Data: 2.30pm Toss Pakistan has won the toss and will bat first.
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run back of a length, off stump line, he is back and across and defending
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run good length, hint of shape back, off stump line, he defends solidly getting in behind it
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run back of a length, outside off, he punches firmly off the back foot but straight to the man at cover
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run good length, shaping back into off, he defends from the crease off the inside half of the bat to forward square
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 wide fuller length, pushed across the left-hander, but too wide according to the umpire. That was a tough call. It wasn't outside the guideline
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run good length, shaping back just outside off, he defends with the full face getting in behind it
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run shorter and wider, he's back and cutting firmly but straight to point
Coulter-Nile to Masood, 1 wide very full and pushed way wide of off and rightly called wide
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run 126kph, good length across him, fifth stump line, he defends on the front foot
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run good length, outside off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run 136kph, good length across the left-hander, he presses forward and defends with a solid top hand to mid off
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run fuller outside off, he drives but mis-times it straight to mid off
Coulter-Nile to Masood, 1 run 133kph, fuller on middle and off, he hangs in the crease and works this with the wrists to the gap wide of mid on to get off the mark
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run 136kph, good length, off stump line, he defends comfortably to cover
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run good length, top of middle, he works this off the front foot to midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run back of a length, shortest ball so far, he's caught on the crease pushing awkwardly off the inside half of the bat to midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run shorter on the hip, he clips this neatly off the back foot but straight to midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run fuller outside off, he drives on the up but doesn't time it purely, straight to mid off
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run 134kph, fuller length outside off, he jabs a drive with the bottom hand to mid off
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run fuller length outside off, he drives on the up but can't beat mid off

Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, SIX runs he advances down the track and launches this straight over the bowler's head! What a shot! Great thinking to skip down and change the length. He just hit straight through the line and flushed it.
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot to cover
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run back of a length, fourth stump line, no swing, he defends on the back foot to cover
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run fuller and wider, he drives nicely but smacks it straight to the man at cover-point
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run back of a length outside off, he is squared up defending to a wide and deep gully
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run shorter length, leg stump line, he's back and working this to the gap at midwicket, he wants two but it's not on as Finch runs from mid on to cut it off
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, no run back of a length, he's back and defending with an open face to the gully but can't get it past the man
Jhye Richardson to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run he drives from the crease and gets a thick edge that runs along the ground safely to third man
Jhye Richardson to Masood, FOUR runs crunch! He hammers a square drive on the up through cover-point with authority! It was not a half-volley, fractionally wide but he nailed it
Jhye Richardson to Masood, FOUR runs Two in two! Not that short but he swivels quickly and pulls off a thick bottom edge but timed it well enough behind square and it raced away
Jhye Richardson to Masood, no run good length, fourth stump line, he defends from the crease back to the bowler

Jhye Richardson to Masood, FOUR runs short ball cracked over forward square! Too easy this one. Shortest ball of the match and on this slow wicket it sat up and Shan Masood smacked a pull shot elegantly over forward square leg.
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run 140kph, good length on off, he defends solidly on the front foot
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, FOUR runs short ball and he is quick onto the back foot pulling beautifully behind square with great control!
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, no run short length outside off, he's up on his toes and defending to point
Coulter-Nile to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run 137kph, shorter and wider of off, he cracks a cut shot and Maxwell makes a superb diving save at point! Can't prevent a single but saves the boundary
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run good length angled into off, he gets a slight leading edge as he tries to work to leg, goes back to the bowler along the ground
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run angled into off again, he waits and tucks this to midwicket
Lyon to Imam-ul-Haq, no run tossed up on off, he reaches forward and defends
Lyon to Imam-ul-Haq, no run drifting into leg, he turns the face and works it to midwicket
Lyon to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run looped up outside off, he drives with control to long off for a single
Lyon to Masood, no run flatter and quicker on off, he steps forward and defends
Lyon to Masood, no run looped up on middle, he works it against the turn but can't beat the man at midwicket
Lyon to Masood, no run shorter length, he's back and giving room, cuts very firmly but straight to cover-point in the circle
Lyon to Imam-ul-Haq, no run good length, off stump, hint of turn, he's back and rushed in defence
Lyon to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run drifting into middle, he tucks this to the gap at midwicket
Lyon to Masood, 1 run drifting into middle, full, he works this against the turn to deep midwicket

Lyon to Imam-ul-Haq, OUT caught and bowled! Beautifully bowled from Lyon. He looped it up outside off, he skips down the track and doesn't get to the pitch, tries to drive and hits a waist high return catch to Lyon and he does not drop those!
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 2 runs edged closing the face and it's just wide of the diving Handscomb at slip! Another great delivery not rewarded, it runs for two to third man
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run fuller on middle, he defends on the front foot
Maxwell to Masood, no run tossed up outside off, he drives straight back to the bowler
Maxwell to Masood, 1 run fuller and he tries to launch down the ground, he mistimes it along the ground to straight mid on for one
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, no run drifting into leg, he works this straight to midwicket
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 2 runs tossed up outside off, he drives in the air wide of cover and wide of long off and they get a couple
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, no run tossed up on middle, he defends with soft hands
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, no run drifting into middle, he just pushes this gently into midwicket
Lyon to Masood, no run tossed up outside off, he reaches out and slices a drive to point
Lyon to Masood, 1 run drifting into leg, he clips this off his pads behind square to the sweeper in the deep
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run good length outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run drifting into leg, he clips this on the front foot to long on
Lyon to Masood, no run fuller, on middle, he pushes this on the front foot against the little turn to midwicket
Lyon to Masood, 1 run flatter and shorter on middle, he's back and working this behind square to the man in the deep
Maxwell to Masood, no run tossed up, he drives straight to cover
Maxwell to Masood, 1 run looped up outside off, he drives nicely with control to long off
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run flatter and slightly shorter, he stands up in the crease and punches this to long off
Maxwell to Masood, no run flatter on leg, he works this straight to midwicket
Maxwell to Masood, FOUR runs sweeps fine from off stump, gets it fine of the man inside the circle and it runs away to the rope!
Maxwell to Masood, 1 run
Lyon to Masood, 1 run shorter length on middle, he's back and whipping this to deep midwicket
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run shorter length, he's back and dropping this to the gap at cover-point for one
Lyon to Masood, no run looped up, he's caught on the crease and pushing this to cover-point
Lyon to Masood, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching to mid on and calling for a tight one
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run good length, he defends off the back foot to point
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run slower, hint of turn, he closes the face and gets a leasing edge and it rolls to cover
Zampa to Masood, no run 82kph, leg break, not much turn, on middle, he defends with the turn to midwicket

Zampa to Masood, no run beaten, it slides through lower outside off as he tries to cut off the back foot. Carey removes the bails and appeals for a stumping? This is odd. He thinks Masood lifted his foot. They are checking upstairs but both feet are in. Odd move to send this upstairs. Not ou
Zampa to Masood, 1 run tossed up on leg, he whips this through square leg to the man in the deep
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run
Zampa to Masood, no run
Zampa to Masood, no run top spinner, full outside off, he drives to mid off but can't beat him
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 2 runs shorter length, he cuts firmly to through point for two
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run tossed up outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
Lyon to Masood, FOUR runs he skips down and launches this down the ground just clearing mid off who is up in the circle!
Lyon to Masood, no run fuller on off, he is forward and defending
Lyon to Masood, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching this to long off
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run tossed up outside off, he's happy to let this go

Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run flatter on leg, he clips this firmly to deep forward square for one

Lyon to Masood, no run tossed up, he steps forward to defend
Lyon to Masood, 1 run floated up outside off, he drives calmly to long off
Zampa to Masood, no run flatter on off, he's back and working with the turn to midwicket
Zampa to Masood, 1 run full toss, but he mistimes it off the thick inside edge to the gap at midwicket

Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run steps down the track and flicks it to midwicket
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, 1 run begins with a fuller ball outside the off stump. He drives it to sweeper cover
Stoinis to Umar Akmal, 1 run short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He lets the ball come to him and deftly flicks it to midwicket for a single
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, 1 wide wide down the leg side

Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run pushed with a straight bat into midwicket
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run fired across outside off, beats the outside edge as he drives. A Jadhav delivery!
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run tucked into midwicket
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run round the wicket, full outside off, driven to deep cover
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run round the wicket, punched sweetly into the leg side but finds mid-on
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, SIX runs clubbed straight down the ground! All the way...picked the slower ball, back of a length, and swung through the line sending it back over the bowler's head
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run fuller delivery, pushed to mid-on
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run bangs in a short ball outside off, he swings and misses with his pull and there's a small query about an edge from Carey
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, 1 run good length outside off, opens the face and steers to third man
Stoinis to Umar Akmal, 1 run this delivery stops a little in the pitch but he's able to bunt it down the ground
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run round the wicket, full at the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run driven through the off side to long-off
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run on the stumps, driven to long-off
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run angled into the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, no run whipped off the pads and picks out square leg
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run finds the gap this time to deep square
Coulter-Nile to Umar Akmal, no run good length wide of off, he tries to cut but chops it off the bottom edge to backward point

Coulter-Nile to Umar Akmal, OUT he holes out to mid off! Caught by Finch running back! This was a strange shot straight after drinks. It was a length ball, he tried to club this down the ground from the crease, he miscued slicing this high straight of mid off but he hit it straight up, Finch
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run length ball into leg, he clips this off the hip neatly through square leg to the sweeper
Coulter-Nile to Malik, 1 run shorter length outside off, he's jumping back and across and angling this through gully, Maxwell races to his left but can't prevent the single
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run full, angled into middle, he whips this with the angle through square leg to the sweeper

Coulter-Nile to Malik, no run edged but it doesn't carry to the keeper! It was a good length, Malik pushed forward and opened the face to run it to third man, gets a thin edge, a clear edge but it falls short of Carey diving forward to his right
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run tossed up, he skips down and drives to long off
Maxwell to Malik, no run beaten by a round arm delivery from around the wicket, sliding on past the outside edge
Maxwell to Malik, no run quicker and flatter, he defends on the front foot

Maxwell to Malik, FOUR runs nearly caught at wide long off! He charges and slices it as it goes across on the angled, it bends away from Lyon at long off running to his left and just bounces wide for four!
Maxwell to Malik, SIX runs charges and smears this with the turn over deep forward square! What a strike to clear the fence!

Maxwell to Malik, OUT Bowled him! Brilliant come back. Stays around the wicket, delivers a good length, drifting across with the angle, he plays for turn trying to drive to long on, it slides past the edge and hits the top of off!
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run good length, angled into off, he covers up in defence
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run shorter outside off, he sits back and opens the face running it to third man for one
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, no run fuller length, on off, he sits back and defends with the angle to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, 1 run 135kph, very full outside off, he drives inside out along the ground to deep cover
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run full outside off, he drives neatly placing it through cover-point to the sweeper
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, 1 run short ball, 134kph, skids on a touch, he swivels and pulls to fine leg, mistiming it but rotating the strike
Maxwell to Faheem, no run round arm, slung into off, he reaches out and defends
Maxwell to Faheem, 1 wide slings this one down the leg side and it's called wide
Maxwell to Faheem, no run slower on middle, he dabs this towards midwicket and wants one but it's not on
Maxwell to Faheem, no run slight leading edge playing back to a ball on middle but it falls safe
Maxwell to Faheem, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching firmly past Maxwell to long off
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run fuller, wide of off, he drives fluently and firmly to deep cover-point

Maxwell to Faheem, 2 runs deceived by some spin, he closed the face, gets an edge but it's safe running fine of short third man and they get a couple. Beautifully bowled by Maxwell to slow that up and get it to grip
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run short wrong un, he's back and slapping a low bouncing ball to long on
Zampa to Faheem, no run full wrong un, he tries to paddle sweep but gets it straight to the man

Zampa to Faheem, FOUR runs edged and just past Khawaja at slip! Dropped chance! It was tough. Brilliant wrong un, got a thick edge that went low and quick and brushed Khawaja's left hand but it ran away for four!
Zampa to Faheem, no run googly again, he's squared up in defence
Zampa to Faheem, 1 run shorter outside off, he's back and punching down to long off
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run short wrong un, he goes leg side and gives room to slap this to deep cover-point
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, FOUR runs round arm, slung in flat and quick, he backs away and cuts hard through point and times it so well it beats the man on the rope!
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run tossed up outside off, he drives firmly to Richardson at deep cover-point
Maxwell to Faheem, no run reverse sweep from outside leg, straight to backward point
Maxwell to Faheem, 1 run round arm, drifting into leg stump, he sits back and tucks this through square leg
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run looped up wide of off, he square drives firmly to deep cover-point
Maxwell to Faheem, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching this down to long off
Zampa to Faheem, no run leg break on leg, he's back and pushing this to midwicket
Zampa to Faheem, 1 run wrong un outside off, he premeditates and paddle sweeps behind square for a single
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run good length, he skips down and drives very hard straight to long off for one
Zampa to Faheem, 1 run shorter leg break on middle, he's back and forcing this down to long on
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run shorter wrong un, he cuts firmly but can't beat Marsh at backward point
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run leg break outside leg stump, he clips this behind square for a single
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 2 runs he skips down and works this firmly to the gap at deep midwicket and they run an easy two
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, no run darted through quicker, cramping him for room, he punches off the back foot to cover
Maxwell to Haris Sohail, 1 run shorter length on leg, he sits back and punches to long on
Maxwell to Faheem, no run round arm outside off, he glides a late cut to short third man but can't rotate the strike
Maxwell to Faheem, no run tossed up outside off, he pushes on the front foot straight to cover
Maxwell to Faheem, FOUR runs brilliantly placed cut shot behind point! It was fractionally short and wide and he waited and cut it just past Finch at backward point and it raced away
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run good length on off, he pushes on the front foot to mid on in the circle
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, 1 leg bye slower ball, back of a length, on leg, it comes off the pad and runs fine for a leg bye

Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, FOUR runs edged but no slip in and it races to fine third man! It was a good length wide of off, he drives on the up and edge this but it's well wide of the keeper and races away
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run fuller on middle, he drives along the ground through mid on for one

Coulter-Nile to Faheem, FOUR runs another edge just wide of Carey! Full blooded drive with no footwork, he gets a thick edge that would have gone to a second slip but no slip in place it runs to fine third man again!
Coulter-Nile to Faheem, 2 runs shorter length, he pulls hard, not quite timing it but he gets it into the gap at deep midwicket for two
Jhye Richardson to Haris Sohail, no run 135kph, good length, he drives and gets a thick edge that flies safely towards third man for a single
Jhye Richardson to Haris Sohail, no run half-volley, he crunches a drive hard but straight to cover

Jhye Richardson to Haris Sohail, FOUR runs another thick edge flies fine of third man, Coulter-Nile dives but can't save it! It was angled across, he drives but gets a thick edge and again gets rewarded with four
Jhye Richardson to Haris Sohail, 1 run full and wide, he drives square to deep cover-point

Jhye Richardson to Faheem, FOUR runs another edge for four! Crazy stuff this! It was full angled wide again, he slices a drive and edged this fine of third man again! Unbelievable. Four times in two overs

Jhye Richardson to Faheem, OUT caught at backward point! Finally a sliced edge goes to hand! It was a slower ball angled across, he slices a square drive off the thick edge checking the shot, it flies to Stoinis at backward point who holds on with both hands moving to his right
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run good length into middle and leg, he's back and tucking this behind square for a single
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, no run shorter length, he charges down the track and swings and misses
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, no run beaten by a good length, Imad tried to angle this with an open face to third man but it went past the edge
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs hammered through cover! Shorter length, he gives room and flat bats it past cover and it races to the rope
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, no run fuller on middle, he mistimes a drive to mid on and can't beat the man
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, 1 run he backs away, Coulter-Nile follows and he slices a cut shot off a thick edge to third man to retain the strike
Jhye Richardson to Imad Wasim, 1 run full outside off, he plays a checked slog sweep, times it well but straight to deep midwicket on the bounce
Jhye Richardson to Haris Sohail, 1 run full outside off, he shuffles out and punches a drive with the bottom hand to long on
Jhye Richardson to Imad Wasim, SIX runs slog sweep over deep square! What a shot! He got down on one knee and slog sweeps this over deep square! The crack of the bat was amazing
Jhye Richardson to Imad Wasim, 2 runs full outside off, he steps across and slog this through square leg to the vacant leg side field for a couple more
Jhye Richardson to Imad Wasim, 1 run full outside off, he steps outside off, and whips but mistimes it wide of mid on
Jhye Richardson to Haris Sohail, 1 run full outside off, he drives to mid off and takes one
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run good length on off, he sits back and tucks this behind square
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs shorter length, he frees the arms and smacks this wide of mid off! What a strike. He backed away and smoked this into the gap!
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs short ball muscled over mid off again! Brilliant from Imad. Short ball and he clubbed it over mid off
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, 1 run full outside off, it's in the slot, he smashes this straight of mid off but Finch makes a great save
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run length slower ball, he pulls this behind square for one

Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs he picks the slower ball and flicks this wide of long on! What a shot to finish! Slower ball, he picked it up and flicked it into the gap wide of long on and straight of deep midwicket. Maxwell tried gallantly but couldn't get there.
We apologise for the technical difficulties in that innings with the scoring and commentary. We will hopefully have them sorted for the run chase.

Innings break Brilliant finish from Pakistan. Imad made 28 not out from 13 balls in a sensational cameo on a slow pitch. The innings was held together by Haris Sohail who makes his maiden ODI century. Australia need 281 to win this first ODI.
Welcome back, folks. Gnasher with you for the start of Australia's chase. Mohammad Amir to start off...
Amir to Khawaja, 1 run hint of swing first up, full outside off, Khawaja presses forward and gets a controlled outside edge to third man
Amir to Finch, no run full and straight, defended to mid-on
Amir to Finch, no run good length outside off, pushed square towards point
Amir to Finch, no run fuller, at off stump, some shape in and met with a straight bat that finds mid-off
Amir to Finch, 1 run runs it to third man off a thickish outside edge, all along the ground
Amir to Khawaja, no run good length outside off, defended solidly to the off side
Abbas to Finch, no run full at off stump, pushed to mid-off
Abbas to Finch, no run length ball outside off, driven to the covers without much timing
Abbas to Finch, no run back of a length at off stump, defended to the covers
Abbas to Finch, 1 run works a straight delivery into midwicket
Abbas to Khawaja, no run good length outside off, Khawaja keen to get forward and drives to the covers
Abbas to Khawaja, no run appeal for lbw as Khawaja plays across the line, sneaks between inside edge and clips the top of the back pad
Amir to Finch, no run back of a length at middle and off, defended firmly to cover
Amir to Finch, 1 run a sharp short delivery on leg stump, that does him for pace which is a good effort on this pitch and it comes off the glove as Finch pulls
Amir to Khawaja, FOUR runs that's an elegant flick from the in-form Khawaja, uses the angle coming into him and flicks this from around off stump through square leg
Amir to Khawaja, no run drives on the up to mid-off
Amir to Khawaja, no run that's a beauty which beats the outside edge, perfect line outside off, zips to the keeper
Amir to Khawaja, no run flicks a slightly straighter delivery to mid-on
Abbas to Finch, 1 run good delivery, full length and shapes back at Finch - that's where's vulnerable to being bowled or lbw - pushed towards mid-on
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run full outside off, driven to the right of mid-off
Abbas to Finch, 1 run short of a length, again it shapes back at Finch, pushed towards mid-on for a tight(ish) single
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run opens the face and steers a length delivery down to third man
Abbas to Finch, no run nips back from short of a length, takes the top of the pad
Abbas to Finch, 1 run flicks a straight delivery down to long leg
Amir to Finch, no run good length at the stumps, defended into midwicket
Amir to Finch, no run pushed into the covers
Amir to Finch, no run well bowled, tight to the stumps, no width for Finch to work with and defends to the bowler
Amir to Finch, FOUR runs that's a very sweet piece of timing from the captain, flicked off the pads through midwicket
Amir to Finch, no run short of a length at middle and off, played into midwicket with a straight bat
Amir to Finch, FOUR runs a fuller delivery and it's pumped straight down the ground, back over Amir's head
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run now it's Khawaja's turn to bring out the drive, but he finds the man at square cover
Abbas to Finch, FOUR runs that's a top shot! Just back of a length outside off, Finch stands tall and drives it backward of square, wide of third man
Abbas to Finch, no run too straight, shapes into the pads and glances down the leg side but he gets away with it
Abbas to Finch, no run back of a length, straight, defended to mid-on
Abbas to Finch, 1 run hops across the crease and tucks a back-of-a-length delivery into midwicket
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run short of a length outside off, strongly square cut towards point where Imam lets it through
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run round the wicket, full outside off, driven powerfully to cover where Haris does well to intercept
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 2 runs tucks a straight delivery off the stumps to deep midwicket
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run over the wicket, skids one over the top edge as Khawaja aims to play square. Bowled quickly
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 2 runs tucked through midwicket for another brace
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs fuller outside off, that's a lovely bit of touch from Khawaja as he opens the face, also using Imad's pace to his advantage
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 2 wide that's barely pitched on the cut strip, fired quick and wide outside off
Imad Wasim to Finch, FOUR runs loses his line again, round the wicket, full on the toes and it's clipped to long leg
Abbas to Khawaja, no run round the wicket, full outside off, driven to cover
Abbas to Khawaja, no run touch straighter, he finds mid-off this time
Abbas to Khawaja, 1 run whipped from around off stump to deep square
Abbas to Finch, no run back of a length at off stump, punched to cover
Abbas to Finch, no run off the back foot to mid-off
Abbas to Finch, no run nips back from short of a length and brings an lbw appeal but that looked high
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run played down the ground
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 wide spears this down the leg side, called wide
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run defended to the on side, very full
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run presses forward and this takes an inside edge backward of square
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run full outside off, jabbed to the on side, Imad gets across
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 4 byes full, width outside off, he drives and gets a bottom edge through the keeper's legs
Abbas to Finch, SIX runs that's a thumping shot! Strides forward into a length delivery and lofts it over wide mid-on...not perfectly timed, but had the legs
Abbas to Finch, no run full and straight, defended to midwicket
Abbas to Finch, 1 run touch shorter, worked with a closed face to deep square
Abbas to Khawaja, no run gets forward an drives to cover
Abbas to Khawaja, FOUR runs that's a bit of a heave from Khawaja, pulling across the line of what was only just a back-of-a-length delivery, runs away through backward square leg
Abbas to Khawaja, no run repeats the shot, this time it goes finer to short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run nearly drags on! Aiming to play square into the off side with a horizontal bat and gets a bottom edge into his boot. Risky
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run that's better, plays a full delivery with a straight bat through mid-on
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run looks to guide this down to third man and is beaten
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run driven into the off side
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run taken from off stump down to long-on
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run pushes a length ball to the off side

Faheem to Khawaja, OUT and he strikes first ball! Shall we give that wicket to Shaz as well? Faheem bangs his first ball in, Khawaja goes for the pull but can only splice it into the on side, mid-on comes around to complete the catch
Faheem to Finch, no run back of a length at off stump, defended
Faheem to Finch, 1 run driven off the back foot to deep cover
Faheem to Marsh, no run over the wicket, good length at off stump, defended to cover
Faheem to Marsh, no run hint of width outside off, square drives it into the ground and it bounces to backward point
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run beats backward point this time as he opens the face to a length delivery
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run taken from outside off down to long on
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 wide down the leg side, another wide
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run full at off stump, pushes forward
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 leg bye worked off the pads behind square
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run defended from off stump back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run worked down the ground from outside off
Faheem to Marsh, no run back of a length, angled across on off stump, left alone and it shapes nicely through to the keeper
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run nicely bowled, a good-length delivery at the stumps, takes a thick outside edge to third man
Faheem to Finch, no run width outside off but Finch mistimes his drive to the covers
Faheem to Finch, no run back of a length at off stump, good line, defended to mid-on with hard hands
Faheem to Finch, 1 run at off stump, this time Finch is able to push it straight enough of mid-on for the single
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run beats the outside edge! A slingy delivery outside off which Marsh plays inside
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run driven to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run pushed into the pads, Finch can't work it away to the leg side
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run touch fuller, flicked to deep square leg
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run shorter outside off, fired into the pitch, tapped through point
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run full at the stumps, pushed to the on side, Imad skips across to collect
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
Faheem to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, pushed to cover
Faheem to Finch, 2 runs touch shorter, outside off, he's on the back foot and drives wide enough of deep cover for the second
Faheem to Finch, 1 run works a straight delivery down to long leg
Faheem to Marsh, 2 runs full outside off, he comes forward to drive and the bat twists in his hands, the ball runs through midwicket and they are able to make a second from it
Faheem to Marsh, no run good line, just outside off, left alone
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run full outside off, eases forward and drives to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run fired in short, or slung in short, pushed to mid-on
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run slower and fuller to Finch, from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run into the pads, clipped to short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Finch, FOUR runs nicely put away, wrong line, pushed full outside leg stump and it just needs a tickle...Finch places it very fine this time
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run driven off the back foot to deep cover
Faheem to Finch, 1 run back of a length on off, 137kph, he defends from the crease manipulating it to the gap at cover-point for a single
Faheem to Marsh, 1 leg bye short onto the hip, it comes off the thigh pad as he tries to glance but it runs fine for a leg bye
Faheem to Finch, 1 run back of a length, angled into middle, he tucks this with angle behind square, they push for two but they stop at one

Faheem to Marsh, 1 run good length, he pushes off the front foot with an open face to backward point, Imam fires at the non-strikers, hits the stumps and they get an overthrow from the ricochet. Needless throw
Faheem to Finch, no run fuller on off, he drives straight back to the bowler
Faheem to Finch, 1 run back of a length wide of off, he's up on his toes punching very nicely to deep point
Imad Wasim to Finch, 2 runs good length outside off, he pushes this into the gap at cover, they push hard for two and run brilliantly to get it
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run fuller outside off, he leans forward and defends
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run pushed through, he gives room and cuts this hard but can't beat point
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run he places this one into the gap behind point and they get the one
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run pushed through outside off, he's back and punching firmly to deep cover-point
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run low full toss, he just bunts this, turning the face to angle it to the big gap at midwicket for a single
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run leg break first up, good length, he pushes on the front foot to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run 90kph leg break, off stump line, he has to defend on the front foot
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run he charges to a shorter ball, he adjusts and punches this to long on, they push for two but it's not on
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run 89kph leg break, tight to off, he cuts from close to his body to backward point
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run top spinner on middle, he works this around his front pad behind square for a single
Yasir Shah to Finch, 2 runs shorter leg break, he's back with ease punching this beautifully past point, he calls two straight away and gets it
Amir to Marsh, 1 run fuller outside off, he drives straight of cover, Haris misfields diving to his left and can't prevent a single
Amir to Finch, 1 run leg stump line, he sits back and whips nicely wide of fine leg but can only get one as he got it too fine to press for a second
Amir to Marsh, 1 run good length, off stump, he defends with an open face to place it behind point and they pinch one straight away
Amir to Finch, no run back of a length on off, he's back and working this straight to midwicket
Amir to Finch, no run bouncer, 136kph, Finch ducks under it and lets it pass. Well bowled

Amir to Finch, FOUR runs another short ball, Finch swivels and pulls from in front of face, he didn't middle it but it beats deep square for four! It hurried him but he controlled it enough with fast hands to find the gap.
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run full on leg stump, he whips this with the spin straight to square leg
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run fuller on off, he steps out and defends back to the bowler
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run he skips down to the pitch and clips this firmly to long on
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run shorter on leg, he sits back and works this forward of square for a single
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run good length on middle, he works this with the turn to square leg
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run looped up, he skips down and mistimes a drive to mid off but goes with the stroke for one. Abbas is inside the circle but could not stop that one
Amir to Marsh, no run 136kph, fuller length on off, he pushes off a thick inside edge to midwicket
Amir to Marsh, no run full into middle, he defends on the front foot
Amir to Marsh, 1 leg bye 142kph, speared into leg stump, it comes off pad and rolls fine for a leg bye, Finch has to stretch to beat the throw from the keeper
Amir to Finch, FOUR runs he misses his line, angled down leg, Finch tickles this fine with ease! Neatly done by the skipper. Amir is annoyed with himself
Amir to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, he opens the face and guides it to backward point
Amir to Finch, no run good length, angled into off, he punches from the crease straight to mid on
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 leg bye he skips down, it beats him in flight and spins into the pad, it rolls away behind square for a leg bye
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run leg break tossed up outside off, he pushes back to the bowler
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run shorter length outside off, he's back and waiting, cutting this through cover-point to the sweeper
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run quicker on middle, he clips this on the front foot to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run flatter and pushed through, he's back and working this with the spin to deep forward square
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run slides this through on leg stump, Finch is back and working this behind square
Abbas to Finch, no run back of a length on off, he's back and punching this back to the bowler
Abbas to Finch, no run good length, angled into middle, he works this with the angle but straight to midwicket
Abbas to Finch, 1 run this on leg stump, he sits back and whips this with the bottom hand through forward square to the sweeper
Abbas to Marsh, 1 run fuller angled into middle and leg, he glances this neatly with the angle to fine leg
Abbas to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, he stands up and punches firmly but straight to cover. Finch is annoyed he couldn't find the gap there
Abbas to Finch, 1 leg bye shorter on the hip, he tries to pull but it comes off the thigh pad and runs behind square for a leg bye
Yasir Shah to Finch, 2 runs he launches this up and over cover and it lands safe in the gap! It wasn't middle but he sliced it into the gap wide of long off
Yasir Shah to Finch, SIX runs smashed straight down the ground! Top spinner too full, in the slot, he took a half step and cracked it straight down the ground for six! Sheer power from Finch.
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run full outside off, driven firmly straight to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run looped up, with some turn, Finch dabs it with soft hands into the off side for one
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run tossed up, he skips out and drives past the bowler to straight long off
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run back of a length, he tries to punch off the back foot a little too square and drags it back to the bowler
Abbas to Marsh, no run beaten! Well bowled. Angled in back of a length, and nipping away, he tries to punch off the back foot square but is beaten but the seam movement
Abbas to Marsh, 1 run fuller into middle, he defends towards mid on and takes an easy one
Abbas to Finch, 1 run veering into leg stump, he sits back and works this through forwards square to the sweeper
Abbas to Marsh, 1 run fuller on off, he mistimes a drive to mid off in the circle and takes the man on with a single and beats the throw from Umar Akmal easily
Abbas to Finch, 1 run shorter and wider, he sits back and late cuts wide of third man but not wide enough to get two
Abbas to Marsh, 1 leg bye angled down leg, it comes off the thigh pad and rolls fine for a leg bye
Yasir Shah to Marsh, FOUR runs cracking pull shot through midwicket! It wasn't too short but he was back in a flash and crunching it through the gap at midwicket and the sweeper could not stop it
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run skips down the track and clips this to long on
Yasir Shah to Finch, FOUR runs hammered down the ground along the carpet straight of long on! What power! He swung from the crease, it was very full, but to beat the man at long on was incredible.
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run misses out on the sweep here. It pitched outside leg, he tried to sweep hard but it comes off the pad
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run shorter length, he is back and trying to cut but mistimes into the off side
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run shorter length, he punches off the back foot but can't beat mid on
Faheem to Marsh, no run slower ball, angled across the left-hander and he misses trying to cut

Faheem to Marsh, 1 run back of a length, he pushes this gently straight of mid on and takes one, Akmal fields and fires and nearly hits Marsh in the head! It was an accident. The throw was aimed at the keeper's end
Faheem to Finch, 1 run angled into middle, he's back and working this through midwicket
Faheem to Marsh, no run shorter on middle, he's whipping this neatly straight to midwicket
Faheem to Marsh, FOUR runs glorious cover drive! On the up he smoked this. The man at cover got a hand on it but it was hit so well it went all the way to the rope
Faheem to Marsh, no run good length, leg stump, he's cramped for room defending

Yasir Shah to Finch, no run dropped! Caught and bowled chance. But it was hardly a chance. Finch hit this so hard! He didn't get a hand on it, it just hit him flush in the chest. That hurt him a bit. Goodness that was clubbed. Yasir is OK.
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run tossed up leg break, Finch reaches forward and pushes this to the gap at cover
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run he steps out and chips this neatly towards long on but well short of the man in the deep
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run good length leg break, he's back and just getting an outside edge as he's squared up defending! That nearly sneaked past and off stump was unprotected.
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run shorter on leg, he's back and working this through midwicket
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run shorter length, top spinner, it holds up in the surface, Marsh chips this off a leading edge up and over midwicket for a single
Faheem to Marsh, no run good length, on middle, he defends from the crease
Faheem to Marsh, no run play and miss trying to pull. It was fractionally short and he tried to hammer a pull but played over the top of it and it just missed the top of off stump
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run fuller on leg, he glances this easily to fine leg
Faheem to Finch, 1 run good length, on middle, he works this to forward square for a single
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run shorter length across him, he late cuts off a thick bottom edge down to third man
Faheem to Finch, 3 runs short of a length outside off, he stands tall and plays a magnificent drive off the back foot through cover, Abbas runs from deep point but they get three
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run shorter leg break, he's back and cracking this firmly to long off
Yasir Shah to Marsh, no run slower leg break, good length, he presses forward and gropes at it, defending off the thick inside edge
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run tossed up, he advances and whips firmly to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run shorter length outside off, he cuts firmly to deep cover-point
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run good length leg break, he's caught on the crease but it able to clip this to the gap at midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run pushed through on middle, he's back and working this to midwicket but he wanted to get it squarer
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run beaten. This skidded straight on, Marsh tried to punch this square through cover-point but misses playing for turn
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run darted into leg stump, it hits him on the pad
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run pushed through again on leg, he clips this straight to midwicket
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run fuller and wider, he ins the ears back and drives hard but mistimes it to cover
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run flatter again on middle, he's trying to get this past midwicket for a single but can't beat the man
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run fired flat at middle and he punches back to the bowler
Amir to Finch, no run good length angled across, he sits back and defends to cover
Amir to Finch, 1 run yorker on middle, he does well to dig this out into the off side
Amir to Marsh, 1 run full angled into leg, he ships this elegantly through square leg to the man in the deep
Amir to Finch, 1 run 136kph, back of a length, he sits back and punches through the line to the sweeper at cover-point
Amir to Marsh, SIX runs launches this over mid on! Right in the slot and Marsh just plants the right leg and swings through the line lofting it down the ground and over the rope! Great shot.
Amir to Marsh, 2 runs full outside off, he steers this easily through extra cover for a couple
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run round the wicket, full at the stumps, played off the back foot which can be dangerous
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run back of a length, punched to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run worked down the ground
Imad Wasim to Finch, 2 wide speared in at the pads, misses everything and they take a run as well
Imad Wasim to Marsh, FOUR runs powerful! He's laced that through the covers, pins the ears back and hammers a full delivery with a terrific drive
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run Amir just reads the spin to cut this off
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run full outside off, worked down the ground
Amir to Marsh, 1 run over the wicket, back of a length, tucked to deep midwicket
Amir to Finch, no run back of a length at middle and off, defended to the bowler
Amir to Finch, 1 leg bye deflects off the pad wide of the keeper
Amir to Marsh, no run pushed up full at off stump, defended on the front foot
Amir to Marsh, 2 runs the bottom hand comes through the shot as he whips this from off stump wide of long-on
Amir to Marsh, 1 run a slower ball, full outside off, steered down to third man
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run full at off stump from over the wicket, tapped to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run plays back and works off the pads to deep midwicket
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run full and straight, pushed towards mid-on and midwicket is able to get across
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run outside leg stump, tucked along the ground
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 1 run uses his feet, makes this into a very full delivery outside off and drives to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 wide loses his line down the leg side, Imad angry with himself
Imad Wasim to Finch, no run he's lucky this time, full at the toes, Finch clips it straight to short fine leg
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run full and straight, plays with the turn as he flicks to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run short outside off but he can't take advantage, driving to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run just short of long-on! Finch trying for the hundred in grand style, coming down the pitch, but drags the shot and almost costs him
Yasir Shah to Marsh, SIX runs that's clean, though! Marsh shows his captain how to do it as skips down the pitch and lofts this miles over long-on
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run flicks this one along the ground having done the hard work
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run can't quite get it away at the moment as he mistimes this to cover
Malik to Marsh, 1 run round the wicket, full at the stumps, worked down the ground
Malik to Finch, no run straight delivery, tucked into midwicket
Malik to Finch, SIX runs hundred with a six! Finch launches this over deep midwicket with a clubbing blow. Some emotional in that celebration. The captain is back
Malik to Finch, 1 run tickled off the pads to deep square leg
Malik to Marsh, 1 run bottom hand comes off the bat as he drives, thickish outside edge into backward point
Malik to Finch, 1 run tucked to deep square leg
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run full outside off, skews off an outside edge to short third man
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run outside leg stump, sent to deep square leg
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run short outside off, he rocks back and cracks to cover
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run length ball at off stump, Finch waits for it to spin and square drives to deep cover
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run worked into midwicket
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run short of a length outside off, played tong-off. All too easy for Australia
Amir to Finch, SIX runs crunched! Into the stands again over deep midwicket. A dismissive blow from Finch, clubbing a full delivery off the stumps
Amir to Finch, no run full and straight, defended
Amir to Finch, no run that's well bowled, does him with the slower short ball, Finch through the shot
Amir to Finch, no run full at the stumps, driven to mid-off
Amir to Finch, 1 run a sweetly struck drive but straight to mid-off
Amir to Marsh, 1 run another slower short ball, Marsh gets into a bit of a tangle but is able to deflect it into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run round the wicket, Marsh comes down the pitch and swings this wide of long-on
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run dropped, that's a shambles from Pakistan, Finch bringing out another hefty blow, miscued it straight down the ground. It was a sitter for Imad at long-off
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run guided to third man
Yasir Shah to Finch, no run gets a bottom edge into the pitch as he looks to chop this away
Yasir Shah to Finch, 1 run drags a very short delivery from outside off, swings it towards long-on...Finch wants to finish this quickly
Yasir Shah to Marsh, 1 run neatly worked from outside off to deep square
Abbas to Marsh, no run round the wicket, length ball outside off, gets a bottom edge as he tries to drive
Abbas to Marsh, 1 run worked off the pads to deep square
Abbas to Handscomb, no run good length outside off, Handscomb pushes hard into a defensive shot which finds cover
Abbas to Handscomb, 1 run leading edge! But flies between point and cover...odd-looking shot, slicing across a back-of-a-length delivery
Abbas to Marsh, no run round the wicket, tight line at off stump, runs off the face to backward point
Faheem to Handscomb, no run over the wicket, length outside off, pushed to point
Faheem to Handscomb, FOUR runs short of a length outside off, pulled through midwicket and into a big gap
Faheem to Handscomb, 2 runs fuller, outside off, nice placement as he steers it wide of third man to allow an easy second
Faheem to Handscomb, no run driven to cover...plays a lot of his shots 'on the walk'
Faheem to Handscomb, no run angled in at the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Faheem to Handscomb, 1 run short of a length, pulled to deep square leg
Abbas to Handscomb, no run dropped in his followthrough, but that would have a great snaffle by Abbas....Handscomb punched it back firmly to his left
Abbas to Handscomb, 1 run chopped into the off side
Abbas to Marsh, no run shovels a good-length delivery to midwicket
Abbas to Marsh, 1 run goes fuller, straight, dug out through the covers to the sweeper
Abbas to Handscomb, 2 runs pushed wide of the cover sweeper, nice placement
Abbas to Handscomb, 1 run straighter delivery, eased down to long-on
Faheem to Handscomb, 1 run length delivery, driven down the ground
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run a short ball, pulled to deep midwicket
Faheem to Handscomb, FOUR runs short of a length outside off, driven up and over the off side, a stand-and-deliver shot, out to deep cover
Faheem to Handscomb, 1 leg bye short again, straighter this time, he goes for the pull and gets taken on the back hip
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run full at the stumps, Marsh staying a touch leg side to given himself room to drive down the ground to long-off
Faheem to Handscomb, 1 run back of a length, angled in, takes a thickish outside edge to long leg
Abbas to Handscomb, 2 runs full and straight, sweetly driven straight down the ground to bisect long-off and long-on
Abbas to Handscomb, no run back of a length at off stump, slower ball, played to point
Abbas to Handscomb, no run can't get this past cover
Abbas to Handscomb, 2 runs uses his feet, walks at the bowler, then clips through square leg
Abbas to Handscomb, 2 runs fuller, at the stumps, heaved through midwicket, long-on is able to get around
Abbas to Handscomb, no run back of a length slower ball, Handscomb leans back, trying to give himself some room, drives to point
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run full outside leg stump, clubbed on the bounce to deep midwicket
Faheem to Handscomb, 2 runs follows the batsman as he moves outside leg, shovelled into the leg side and sluggish fielding allows a second
Faheem to Handscomb, 1 run big full toss, again Handscomb moving outside leg, driven to deep cover
Faheem to Marsh, 1 wide poor ball, full down the leg side...Rizwan suggests it clipped the pad. Nope, missed everything
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run back of a length outside off, hammered to long-off
Faheem to Handscomb, 1 run short of a length outside off, driven into the covers
Faheem to Marsh, 1 run big full toss on the pads, swung to deep midwicket
Amir to Marsh, 1 run short outside off, Marsh is almost through his shot too early and lobs it down the ground to long-off
Amir to Handscomb, 1 run full outside off, Handscomb in a very odd position as he fetches it down to long leg
Amir to Marsh, 1 run goes for the yorker, it's a low full toss, just a single out to deep midwicket
Amir to Handscomb, 1 run back of a length outside off, pushed into the covers without any real timing...they are doing it in singles
Amir to Marsh, FOUR runs short of a length, goes for the pull and gets a big top edge which flies back over the keeper...just two needed now
Amir to Marsh, 2 runs and that's the victory! A full toss is clipped out to deep midwicket. They scamper back for the second, Handscomb brings the dive out
That just about wraps things up for today. Thanks for staying with us during the earlier problems. We'll be back on Sunday. Until then, from Gnasher and Alex, it's goodbye.

Australia win by eight wickets and that's four wins in a row now. A very efficient run chase, led by Aaron Finch's century which Shaun Marsh supporting him well. It never really looked in doubt from a long way out. Earlier, Australia's spinners did a very good job on a slow surface as Pakistan neve
Australia won by 8 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Aaron Finch, AUS
